app.name: MyPromptHub
app.tagline: Browse, customize, save, and organize research prompts

home.title: MyPromptHub
home.subtitle: Browse, customize, and organize research prompts for your projects
home.browsePromptsDesc: Discover research prompts for various purposes and customize them to your needs
home.savedPromptsDesc: Access your saved prompts and organize them for easy reference

browse.title: Browse Research Prompts
browse.subtitle: Discover and customize research prompts for your projects
browse.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search or filters

saved.title: Saved Prompts
saved.subtitle: Manage and organize your saved research prompts
saved.browseToSave: Browse prompts and save them to see them here

prompt.translationMissing: Translation not available for this prompt. Showing English version.

create.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of what this prompt does
create.variableSyntaxHelp: Use {variable_name} syntax to create variables that users can customize. Variables will be automatically detected and added to the variables section below.

github.notLoggedIn: You need to login with GitHub first
github.tokenInstructions: To connect with GitHub, you need to create a Personal Access Token with the 'gist' scope.

settings.title: Settings
settings.supabaseDescription: Supabase provides cloud storage for prompts and translations.

analytics.title: Analytics Settings
analytics.description: Control which analytics services are enabled for this application
analytics.googleAnalyticsDesc: Helps us understand how you use the application, which features are popular, and how we can improve your experience.
analytics.microsoftClarityDesc: Provides heatmaps and session recordings to help us understand how you interact with the interface and identify usability issues.
analytics.refreshNote: Changes will take effect after saving and refreshing the page.
analytics.aboutAnalyticsDesc: We use analytics to understand how our application is used and to improve the user experience. All data is collected anonymously and is not used to identify individual users.
analytics.gaDesc: Google Analytics helps us understand general usage patterns, popular features, and user journeys through the application.
analytics.clarityDesc: Microsoft Clarity provides heatmaps and session recordings that help us identify usability issues and improve the interface.
analytics.changeAnytime: You can change these settings at any time. If you disable analytics, no data will be collected about your usage of the application.

common.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
